abstract: Greater detail on executive pay will arrive this spring. But shareholders won’t have a greater say on how that pay is computed if some companies get their way.
snippet: Greater detail on executive pay will arrive this spring. But shareholders won’t have a greater say on how that pay is computed if some companies get their way.
lead_paragraph: GREATER detail on executive pay will arrive this spring, thanks to new regulatory requirements. But shareholders won’t have a greater say on how that pay is computed if companies like AT&T and Verizon Communications get their way.

headline.main: Roadblocks to Greater Say on Pay
headline.print_headline: Roadblocks To Greater Say on Pay
